page.title: Users
page.description: Administrate all users in Nem Lager

modal-delete-user.title: Delete user?
modal-delete-user.description: This action is permanent and cannot be reversed. Are you sure?

modal-delete-link.title: Slet inviteringslink?
modal-delete-link.description: Denne handling er permanent og kan ikke laves om. Er du helt sikker?

modal-create-user.title: Invite or register a new user
modal-create-user.description: The user will only recieve an email upon registering if you choose to do so.
modal-create-user.customer-limit-reached: Customer has reached their user limit
modal-create-user.role-access-label: Which rights should the user have?
modal-create-user.role-web-access: The user should have access to the web
modal-create-user.role-app-access: The user should have access to the app
modal-create-user.role-price-access: The user should have access to the prices
modal-create-user.mail-checkbox: Send an email to the user with login information

invite-create-action.email-already-exists: A user with that email already exists
invite-create-action.client-user-limit: Customer has reached their user limit
invite-create-action.link-not-created: Something went wrong when creating users invite link
invite-create-action.email-subject: You have been invited to {{app}} by Skancode A/S on behalf of {{customer}}
invite-create-action.user-not-created: Something went wrong when creating the user

modal-resend-link.title: Send new invite link
modal-resend-link.description: Send a new invite link to user if the old link is expired or not received.
